name: Cardscape
description:
Click the cards from LARGEST to SMALLEST!

  • Space - To start the Game
  • Left Click - to Click the cards and other buttons

I made this game because every since properly starting game dev last year it has always been a dream of mine to make a card game. Why? i don't really know. Personally i don't even play card games, but for some reason i always wanted to make one. I don't know something about that as always drawn me in. so here is my attempt at making a simple card game. just to point out. this was made in around 4 days so its not he best i can do, and the development isn't finished yet. I am planning on making the game better and perfecting it, as i know of a couple bugs in the game. I am also going to be releasing it on mobile, but currently there is an around 2 week review wait list for any google play store apps. so in a  few weeks, the game should be out on mobile and should be heavily improve. but anyways i still hope you enjoy it and like
